response.overview: Nabin madhab is a Geologist who goes to a jungle for his research work. He met with Achira and gradually they fall in love with each other. Achira was a deprived lady and that's why Nabin madhab was more concerned about her and for that reason his research work had been focused out. Is he coming out of the problem, what will Achira do then...?! What happened next...?!
response.title: SESH KOTHA
